name: Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Gluten Free Cookies (with a secret ingredient)
description: Oatmeal chocolate chip gluten free cookies with a secret ingredient. Vegan recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 tsp guar gum ((optional. Iâ€™ve made these without the gum and they comes out fine))
1/2 cup puffed rice ((murmura in hindi. cheap at an indian store))
1/4 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice or other spices of choice

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix the flaxmeal in 2 Tablespoons hot water and keep for 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, mix the flaxmeal in 2 Tablespoons hot water and keep for 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in 2 tablespoons hot water, coconut oil and canola oil and mix so the coconut oil melts a bit. (or melt the coconut oil separately and add)
recipeInstructions.name: Add in 2 tablespoons hot water, coconut oil and canola oil and mix so the coconut oil melts a bit. (or melt the coconut oil separately and add)

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the sugar, agave, spices, salt and lemon juice and mix well for 2 minutes using hand or electric mixer( I dont use the electric one, since the mixture doesnt need much fluffing up)
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the sugar, agave, spices, salt and lemon juice and mix well for 2 minutes using hand or electric mixer( I dont use the electric one, since the mixture doesnt need much fluffing up)

recipeInstructions.text: Grind the 2/3 cup oats along with baking powder and guar gum, or use 1/2 cup oat flour and mix in the baking powder and guar gum powder. Add to wet mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Grind the 2/3 cup oats along with baking powder and guar gum, or use 1/2 cup oat flour and mix in the baking powder and guar gum powder. Add to wet mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Coarsely grind the puffed rice/rice krispies, with just a few pulses to break the rice into smaller pieces. Add this to wet mix as well.
recipeInstructions.name: Coarsely grind the puffed rice/rice krispies, with just a few pulses to break the rice into smaller pieces. Add this to wet mix as well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the whole oats and chocolate chips and mix well to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the whole oats and chocolate chips and mix well to combine.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop spoonfulls on parchment lined baking sheet. press down with oiled hand or spoon and shape a bit.
recipeInstructions.name: Drop spoonfulls on parchment lined baking sheet. press down with oiled hand or spoon and shape a bit.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in preheated 350 degrees F oven for 12-14 minutes. Cool on rack and enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Bake in preheated 350 degrees F oven for 12-14 minutes. Cool on rack and enjoy!

keywords: easy cookie recipe, gluten free cookies, vegan cookies
